title: Madshot: Road to Madness Directly Download
description:
Play as an alchemist and metaphysician who meddled with dark forces one time too many. Dragged into an infinite abyss of madness and monsters. How will he escape? Doge, roll, dash, wall jump , flip, while simultaneously shooting. MMORPG Tycoon 2
Madshot: Road to madness offers fluid and responsive movement, you’re always in control of the mayhem. Slaughter, Subdue and control endless hordes of enemies. Get the highest score possible, challenge your friends or climb the online leaderboards. There’s a big focus on synergies between unlockable weapons , sidearms, upgrades, and ultimate abilities. Discovering the right combinations will be vital.

system_requirements.Processor: Intel Core 2 DUO 2.4 GHz / AMD Athlon X2 2.7 GHz
system_requirements.Graphics: Nvidia GTX 650 Ti or AMD HD 7850
